explanation: No additional symbols are required. The target function OS_API_Impl_Init contains no for statements, so the MISRA requirement for well-formed for loops does not apply to this function as written. The MISRA clause only requires inspecting the for statement itself and any functions called from within a for-loop body; since there are no for loops here, none of the callee bodies (or other symbols such as OS_OBJECT_TYPE_* constants or OS_SUCCESS) need to be examined to decide compliance. (If any of the switch-case calls were implemented as macros or inlined code that expand into for loops inside this translation unit, then those macro/inline definitions would become necessary to inspect — but no such macros/inlines appear in the provided source.)
